message: CRITICAL DISCOVERY: Parameter control listener is stuck in setup phase. Last log shows 'Setting up realtime subscriptions...' but never completes - this is why no commands are processed.

data.stuck_at: Setting up realtime subscriptions for parameter_control_commands table...
data.comparison: Earlier run at 14:44:28 showed '⚠️ Parameter control listener ready with POLLING ONLY (realtime failed)' but current run never reaches ready state
data.impact: System never enters polling or realtime mode - commands cannot be processed

message: INVESTIGATION COMPLETE: Root cause identified and fix deployed. Parameter control listener hangs at realtime subscription - spawned fixer agent to implement timeout handling.

data.root_cause: await realtime_channel.subscribe() hangs indefinitely at line 262
data.impact: System never enters ready state, commands cannot be processed
data.enhanced_logging_status: Implemented correctly but never executes due to hang
data.database_status: No commands inserted since 14:48:48 - commands not reaching database
data.solution_deployed: Child fixer agent fixer-145343-a10e7f deployed to implement asyncio.wait_for() timeout
data.expected_fix: Add 10-15 second timeout around realtime subscription to enable polling fallback
data.user_verification: After fix, main.py should reach ready state and show enhanced emoji logging
